svg.script: document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest function doTest() { document.getElementById("g").transform.baseVal.getItem(0).setTranslate(20, 20); document.getElementById("r2").transform.baseVal.getItem(0).setTranslate(70, 70); document.getElementById("r1").transform.baseVal.getItem(0).setTranslate(180, 180); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
